subject: Football
Playoff Games
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Brown, the N.F.L.’s leading receiver this season, sustained a concussion on a hit by the Bengals’ Vontaze Burfict. Roethlisberger (shoulder) may also miss Pittsburgh’s game against the Broncos.
snippet: Brown, the N.F.L.’s leading receiver this season, sustained a concussion on a hit by the Bengals’ Vontaze Burfict. Roethlisberger (shoulder) may also miss Pittsburgh’s game against the Broncos.
